name: Ice Peak (IcePeakk)
description:
Description

Venture deep into ice peak mountain to discover the ancient ruins of a dead civilization. Use the power of fire and ice to get past obstacles and solve puzzles.  Play as the scientist Liz as she travels through the mountain to find ruins and escape from the mountain that's littered with traps. Along the way the player will find beautiful landscapes that can be saved in the gallery.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Q - Fire Aura

E - Ice Aura

R - Turn off Aura

TAB - Menu

BACKSPACE - Reset

Credits Developers

Alexis Hulbert - Level Design

Fred Gauthier - Artist

Thomas Vanderwyst - Programming

Sara Ahmed - Sound Design

Music

AudioLibrary.com.co

Font
